org.hibernate.ogm.dialect

Class GridDialectLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hibernate.ogm.dialect.GridDialectLogger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, GridDialect, Service

    public class GridDialectLogger
extends Object
implements GridDialect
    A wrapper dialect that logs the calls performed on the real dialect. It is only used when this class's logger level is set to Trace
    Author:
    Sebastien Lorber (lorber.sebastien@gmail.com), Emmanuel Bernard
    See Also:
    GridDialectFactoryImpl.buildGridDialect(java.util.Map, org.hibernate.service.ServiceRegistry), Serialized Form

      Returns true if this grid dialect logger should wrap the real grid dialect

      • overrideType

        public GridType overrideType(Type type)
        Description copied from interface: GridDialect
        Let the dialect override types if required to customize them to the datastore. Returns the GridType instance to use to bind the given type or null if not overridden. Most types should not be overridden and thus return null Experimental: this API might change in the future
        Specified by:
        overrideType in interface GridDialect

        Specified by:
        forEachTuple in interface GridDialect
        Parameters:
        consumer - the instance that is going to be called for every Tuple
        entityKeyMetadatas - the key metadata of the tables for which we want to apply the costumer
